casebody.data:
In the Matter of SHERIDAN-SEVILLE CORP., Debtor. No. 5858. Circuit Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Oct. 9, 1936. Max Swiren, • of Chicago, 111., for appellant. Hargrave A. Long, of Chicago, 111., for appellee.

Before EVANS, Circuit Judge, and LINDLEY and BRIGGLE, District Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Now this day come the parties by their counsel and this cause now comes on to be heard on the printed record and briefs of counsel and on oral arguments.

On consideration whereof it is now here ordered, adjudged, and decreed by this court that the order or decree of the District Court of the United States for the Northern District of Illinois, Eastern Division, in this cause appealed from be, and the same is hereby, affirmed, with costs.
